compliant.section: 鳳凰旅行社股份有限公司將在事前或註冊登入取得您的同意後，傳送商業性資料或電子郵件給您。鳳凰旅行社股份有限公司除了在該資料或電子郵件上註明是由鳳凰旅行社股份有限公司發送，也會在該資料或電子郵件上提供您能隨時停止接收這些資料或電子郵件的方法及說明。
compliant.legal provisions: Grounds for consent, Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Right to withdraw consent at any time

non_compliant.section: Cookies 是伺服端為了區別使用者的不同喜好，經由瀏覽器寫入使用者硬碟的一些簡短資訊。您可以於該瀏覽器的「網際網路選項」的「隱私權」項目中，選擇修改您瀏覽器對cookies的接受程度，包括接受所有cookies、設定cookies時得到通知、拒絕所有cookies等三種。如果您選擇拒絕所有的cookies，您就可能無法使用部份個人化服務，或是參與部份的活動。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject,  Conditions for consent,  Unambiguous indication of wishes
non_compliant.amend: This section doesn't clearly state that using cookies to distinguish user preferences requires specific, informed, and unambiguous consent. It needs to be clear that users have the choice to accept cookies for this purpose and that their browsing experience will not be negatively impacted if they refuse.

non_compliant.section: 為了提供您更好、更個人化的服務，以及方便您參與個人化的互動活動，Cookies 在您註冊或登入時建立，並在您登出時修改。另外，為了統計瀏覽人數及分析瀏覽模式，以瞭解網頁瀏覽的情況，做為本網站改善服務的參考，本網站會在本政策原則下，在您瀏覽器中寫入並讀取cookies。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation, Lawfulness of processing,  Data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: This section doesn't specify the legal basis for collecting and processing data for analytics and service improvement. It should clearly state the purpose and legal basis for using cookies for these purposes, such as legitimate interest, and provide users with the option to opt-out.

non_compliant.section: 此外，本公司網站會自動接收並紀錄您瀏覽器上的伺服器數值，包括協定位址（IP Address）、cookie中的資料及您要求取用的網頁紀錄。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation,  Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject,  Period for which the personal data will be stored
non_compliant.amend: This section doesn't mention the purpose and legal basis for collecting and storing IP addresses and other browsing data. It should specify the purpose, legal basis, and retention period for this data, and inform users about their rights regarding this data.
